review_title: Good place to deliver international projects in Serbia
pros: Delivering important projects for endangered and communities in Serbia.

job_title: Anonymous Employee in Belgrade, Central Serbia
pros: Great collective, good working atmosphere, lots of opportunities for improvement, dynamic tasks, and great overall communication.
cons: Not many space for advancement or rather to say - you won't be promoted. Maybe never, certainly not in a long time. Apart from that, the paycheck also won't get higher over time, nor will you receive any bonuses for any additional work.
